Docs.summary: The namespace contains classes that provide configuration for Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) applications that use the WS-Federation protocol. The classes in this namespace represent settings under the <system.identityModel.services> element. The namespace also contains some of the classes that are used to configure WS-Federation. Classes that configure other service and application settings, such as security token handlers, are contained primarily in the namespace. These settings appear under the <identityConfiguration> element in a configuration file.
